headline: J.D. Vance: I’m Sick of Being Told That We Have To Care More About People 6,000 Miles Away Than We Do America
sentences:
EXCERPT:
VANCE: “I’m sick of being told that we have to care more about people 6,000 miles away than we do people like my mom and my grandparents and all the kids who are affected by this crisis."

‘Maybe they ought to guarantee the sovereignty of their own country and their own border first’
This story is cross-posted at our consumer site, Grabien News.
